title: Digitalized old fonts?
content:
Curious if anyone knows if the following fonts from this page are available in digitalized format. Some of the fonts seems to contain alternates and ligatures not available in the ITC or Linotype version of the same font...

[http://e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/revival/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710050317/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/revival/index.html "http://e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/revival/index.html")
author: jch02140
